message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away too much either.
You're not giving me enough, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I need a fair share.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to break the bank. You're getting close to what I'm willing to give.
